firstNightReminder: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player whose character is different than the character type of the player marked with the 'Seen' reminder. Move the 'Seen' reminder next to that character.
name: Balloonist
ability: Each night, you learn a player of a different character type than last night. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Acrobat points to a player. If that player is drunk or poisoned, the Acrobat dies.
name: Acrobat
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are drunk or poisoned, you die.

firstNightReminder: Whenever appropriate, treat the Hermit as if they are the other Outsiders, including waking them at night, and using other Outsiders reminder token. If the Hermit duplicates an in-play Outsider, use the Hermit's '1', '2' and '3' reminders instead. The Hermit may remove the Hermit from play during setup, resulting in one less Outsider than normal. If this happens, the Hermit may still be a bluff given to the Demon.
otherNightReminder: Whenever appropriate, treat the Hermit as if they are the other Outsiders, including waking them at night, and using other Outsiders reminder token. If the Hermit duplicates an in-play Outsider, use the Hermit's '1', '2' and '3' reminders instead.
name: Hermit
ability: You have all Outsider abilities. [-0 or -1 Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a not-in-play good character. Put the Boffin to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Boffin token, then the not-in-play good character token. Place this second character token by the Demon character token. Put the Demon to sleep.
name: Boffin
ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

otherNightReminder: The Ojo points to a character. That character, if in play, dies. If that character is not in play, choose zero, one, or more players to die.
name: Ojo
ability: Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
